draft_content.subject: Re: Invoice #12345 from Vendor
draft_content.body:
Hi Bob,

Thank you for the reminder regarding Invoice #12345. I've received your message and will prioritize this task as requested. I expect to have this processed by the end of day today.
suggested_actions: Process invoice by end of day

draft_20251125_132138.prompt_used:
You are an email reply assistant. Generate a professional draft reply to the following email.

Original Email:
From: bob.martinez@company.com
Subject: Invoice #12345 from Vendor
Body:
Hi there,

This is a friendly reminder about the upcoming deadline. Please prioritize this task.

Regards

Reply Guidelines:
- Use a professional and friendly tone
- Address the sender by name if available
- Acknowledge their request or message
- For meeting requests: propose 2-3 specific time slots
- For questions: provide a helpful response or indicate when you'll follow up
- For action items: confirm receipt and provide a timeline
- Keep it concise (3-5 sentences)

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "subject": "<reply subject line>",
  "body": "<reply body text>",
  "tone": "<professional/friendly/formal>",
  "suggested_actions": ["<follow-up action 1>", "<follow-up action 2>"]
}

draft_content.subject: Re: Training Session Reminder
draft_content.body:
Hi there,

Thank you for sending over the document. I have received it and will review it promptly.

I will ensure to provide my feedback by EOD today as requested.

Best regards,
